title: Benton Integrative Medicine - Vaccine Efficacy and Risks: There are many opinions about vaccinations. Dr. Benton has her own personal journey with vaccines and shares it in The Energy BluePrint podcast with Ari Whitten. She has done extensive research on vaccinations, specifically the flu vaccine.
